product_highlights: SpecPure® Inulin - high purity cosmetic grade
Sourced from Jerusalem artichoke roots (Helianthus tuberosus L.)
Fine powder form for easy formulation
notes: Spectrum Chemical manufactures and distributes SpecPure® Inulin, a high-purity cosmetic-grade prebiotic ingredient sourced from Jerusalem artichoke roots (Helianthus tuberosus L.). SpecPure® brand ensures exceptional quality and consistency, making it suitable for premium skincare formulations targeting microbiome health. Inulin acts as a prebiotic, selectively feeding beneficial skin bacteria and supporting microbiome balance. Fine powder form allows for easy incorporation into various formulations. Listed on UL Prospector platform for easy sourcing. Strong reputation for quality and reliability in the cosmetic ingredient industry.
